description: Trusty contains a vulnerability in NVIDIA OTE protocol message parsing code, which is present in all the TAs. An incorrect bounds check can allow a local user through a malicious client to access memory from the heap in the TrustZone, which may lead to information disclosure.

product.name: NVIDIA Jetson, TX2 series, TX2 NX, AGX Xavier series, Xavier NX

enisaIdProduct.product_version: All Jetson Linux versions prior to r32.5.1
